item.title: Intelligent Investment: Blinkist Summary
item.description: Cross post from Reddit Blinkist is an website I found which summarises whole books into 10 minute read, Will put this summary as text post as it wouldn’t be visible if you won’t sign up for it. Do check out the website and support them. 1.Whatâ€™s in it for me? Discover how to invest like Warren Buffett Have you ever thought about investing in the stock market?
